roleset.name: to get/move/remove with great effort

example.name: get time down
example.text: He eked the time down by just under half a second as the session went on but his 1:46.520 was only good enough for sixth.
example.arg: by just under half a second

roleset.note: EKE-V NOTES: Roleset based on WSJ-nw. Framed by Claire (from eke.01-v)

roleset.name: to attain with great effort

example.name: Typical usage
example.text: But always, in years past , they have bucked the trend and have been able to pick up a fifth vote PRO to eke out a number of major victories in civil rights and liberties cases.
example.arg: a number of major victories in civil rights and liberties cases.

roleset.note: EKE_OUT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. (from eke.02-v)
